ABOUT-ME.intro: Hi, I'm a german speaking Frontend Developer based in Freiburg. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
ABOUT-ME.location: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Munich and remotely.
ABOUT-ME.mind: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT-ME.profession: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

SKILL-SET.intro: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
SKILL-SET.answer: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

PROJECTS.text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

Project.description-project-1: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
Project.description-project-2: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
Project.description-project-3: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

COLLEAGUES-VOICES.header: What my colleagues say about me

card-1.text: Richard is an indispensable team member. His technical expertise and solution-oriented way of thinking have significantly advanced our project.

card-2.text: Mr. Wezel particularly appreciates his reliability and ability to solve complex problems quickly. He promotes a positive working atmosphere and motivates the entire team.

card-3.text: With his excellent communication skills and commitment, he contributes significantly to the success of our department. Max is always willing to share his knowledge and proactively supports colleagues.

invitation-to-contact-me.text: Contact me through this formular, I am interessted in hearing from you, knowing your Ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
